statements: SELECT * FROM Patients
SELECT patient_name, patient_age FROM Patients WHERE patient_gender = 'M'
SELECT patient_id, patient_name, diagnosis FROM Patients WHERE patient_age > 30
SELECT patient_id, patient_name, diagnosis FROM Patients ORDER BY patient_age DESC
SELECT * FROM Patients WHERE diagnosis LIKE '%flu%'
SELECT * FROM Patients WHERE patient_age > 30 ORDER BY patient_age DESC LIMIT 5
SELECT patient_name, diagnosis FROM Patients WHERE patient_gender = 'F' ORDER BY patient_age ASC
SELECT * FROM Patients WHERE patient_age BETWEEN 20 AND 40 AND treatment = 'Medication'
SELECT patient_name, patient_age, diagnosis FROM Patients WHERE diagnosis LIKE '%COVID%'
SELECT DISTINCT patient_gender FROM Patients
SELECT * FROM researchers;
SELECT researcher_name, researcher_id FROM researchers ORDER BY researcher_name DESC;
SELECT researcher_id, researcher_name FROM researchers WHERE researcher_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM patient_data WHERE age > 30;
SELECT patient_name, age, condition FROM patient_data ORDER BY condition ASC;
SELECT researcher_name FROM researchers WHERE researcher_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM researchers ORDER BY researcher_id DESC;
SELECT researcher_name, COUNT(*) AS total_patients FROM researchers JOIN patient_data ON researchers.researcher_id = patient_data.patient_id GROUP BY researcher_name;
SELECT researcher_name, patient_name, age FROM researchers JOIN patient_data ON researchers.researcher_id = patient_data.patient_id WHERE age > 30 ORDER BY patient_name ASC;
SELECT MAX(age) AS max_age, MIN(age) AS min_age, AVG(age) AS avg_age FROM patient_data;
SELECT * FROM researchers
SELECT name, email FROM researchers
SELECT * FROM patients WHERE age > 30
SELECT name, gender FROM patients WHERE gender = 'Male'
SELECT outcome_type, outcome_value FROM healthcare_outcomes
SELECT * FROM researchers WHERE researcher_id = 1;
SELECT name, email FROM researchers ORDER BY name DESC;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_patients FROM patients;
SELECT * FROM patients WHERE age > 30 AND gender = 'Male';
SELECT patient_id, outcome_type, outcome_value FROM healthcare_outcomes WHERE outcome_type = 'Blood Pressure' ORDER BY patient_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM researchers;
SELECT name, email FROM researchers WHERE institution = 'University';
SELECT * FROM datasets WHERE dataset_size > 1000 ORDER BY dataset_name DESC;
SELECT researcher_id, name, email, institution FROM researchers WHERE email LIKE '%@gmail.com%';
SELECT outcome_id, outcome_name FROM healthcare_outcomes WHERE outcome_description IS NOT NULL;
SELECT * FROM researchers WHERE name = 'John Doe';
SELECT dataset_name, dataset_size FROM datasets ORDER BY dataset_size DESC;
SELECT patient_name, age, gender FROM patient_information WHERE age > 30 AND gender = 'Male';
SELECT * FROM researchers JOIN datasets ON researchers.researcher_id = datasets.researcher_id WHERE researchers.institution = 'University X';
SELECT outcome_name, outcome_description FROM healthcare_outcomes WHERE outcome_description LIKE '%positive%' ORDER BY outcome_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM patients;
SELECT patient_name, patient_age FROM patients WHERE patient_gender = 'Male';
SELECT patient_name, diagnosis FROM patients WHERE patient_age > 50 ORDER BY patient_age DESC;

SELECT patient_name, doctor_name, hospital_id FROM patients INNER JOIN patient_doctor ON patients.patient_id = patient_doctor.patient_id INNER JOIN doctors ON patient_doctor.doctor_id = doctors.doctor_id;
SELECT treatment_name, treatment_cost FROM treatments WHERE treatment_cost > 100 ORDER BY treatment_cost ASC;
SELECT * FROM patients;
SELECT patient_name, patient_age, diagnosis FROM patients WHERE patient_age > 50 ORDER BY patient_age DESC;
SELECT doctor_name, doctor_specialty, hospital_id FROM doctors WHERE doctor_specialty = 'Cardiology';
SELECT patient_name, patient_gender FROM patients WHERE diagnosis LIKE '%flu%' AND patient_age < 30;

SELECT patient_name, treatment_name, treatment_cost FROM patients JOIN patient_treatment ON patients.patient_id = patient_treatment.patient_id JOIN treatments ON patient_treatment.treatment_id = treatments.treatment_id WHERE treatment_cost > 500 ORDER BY treatment_cost DESC;
